name: Not Much Of A Hero
description:
╭──╯ setting ╰──╮

You are a little boy -
born to be a hero!
And your first task as a hero?
Saving the princess, of course!
What could go wrong?

╭──╯ gameplay╰──╮

Play through our small pixel platformer as our little hero, 
saving the princess as the level gets harder and harder!
